aka: Swedish Candy, Some Violence and a Bit of Cat

writer.name: 埃斯特·马丁·伯格斯马克 Ester Martin Bergsmark

director.name: 埃斯特·马丁·伯格斯马克 Ester Martin Bergsmark

trans_title: Swedish Candy, Some Violence and a Bit of Cat
introduction: Gelatine is of animal origin, odourless and, when liquid, can be moulded into almost any imaginable shape. Swedish Candy, Some Violence and a Bit of Cat is also fluid: a sugary clash between violence and love, old and new, Tarzan and Jane. Above all, incitement to transgress the boundaries between all these binaries.
